workflowcustomfield.label: [SS] VB Qty Greater Than PO Qty
[SS] VB Qty Less Than PO Qty
[SS] VB Amt Greater Than PO Amt
[SS] VB Amt Less Than PO Amt

accountingpreferences
UNRECEIVEDBILLS
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and PO exceeds the Vendor Quantity Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and PO exceeds the Item Quantity Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and PO exceeds the Subsidiary Quantity Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and Item Receipt exceeds the Vendor Quantity Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and Item Receipt exceeds the Item Quantity Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and Item Receipt exceeds the Subsidiary Quantity Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and PO exceeds the Vendor Quantity difference limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and PO exceeds the Item Quantity difference limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and PO exceeds the Subsidiary Quantity difference limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and Item Receipt exceeds the Vendor Quantity Difference limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and Item Receipt exceeds the Item Quantity Difference limit
Discrepancy between the Quantity on Bill and Item Receipt exceeds the Subsidiary Quantity Difference limit
Bill quantity exceeds PO quantity
PO quantity exceeds Bill quantity
Discrepancy between the Amount on Bill and PO exceeds the Vendor Amount Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Amount on Bill and PO exceeds the Item Amount Tolerance limit
Discrepancy between the Amount on Bill and PO exceeds the Subsidiary Amount Tolerance limit
Bill amount exceeds PO amount
PO amount exceeds Bill amount

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!

You have a new purchase invoice {transactionnumber}  to review and approve. 

Purchase Invoice Number : {tranid}
Supplier : {entity}

Best Regards
NetSuite

Please follow the link below to approve / reject
sendemailaction.conditionformula: {nextapprover.id} is not null and {nextapprover.email} is not null
sendemailaction.subject: Vendor Bill {transactionnumber} for Approval

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!


Purchase invoice {transactionnumber} has been rejected by {nextapprover}.<


Please follow the link below and take appropriate action


Best Regards


NetSuite
sendemailaction.subject: Your purchase invoice {transactionnumber} is Rejected

addbuttonaction.conditionformula: ({user.id}!={nextapprover.id} or ({user.id} is null and {nextapprover.id} is not null) or ({user.id} is not null and {nextapprover.id} is null))
addbuttonaction.label: Re-submit for Approvals

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!


Congratulation, purchase invoice {transactionnumber} has been approved by {nextapprover}


Supplier: {entity}


Best Regards
NetSuite
sendemailaction.subject: Your Vendor Bill {transactionnumber} is Approved
